name: Vintage Shirt
description: Stay classy with this timeless striped Short Sleeve Patterned Vintage Shirt For Men. Perfect for a smart-casual look.

name: Match Point Tennis Skirt
description: Grand Slam tournaments? Check! Olympic medals? Check! No. 1 golden girl Ash is our fitspo crush right now, so we're stealing her style with this super cute Match Point tennis skirt. Constructed with Eco Relay for a lightweight fit, freedom of movement and breathability, and featuring under short with side pockets, this is the perfect tennis companion! But why not take this number beyond the sidelines and wear it for running, team sports, or cheering on your fav player from the couch!

name: Geometric Shirt
description: This bowling shirt features bright and colourful geometric motifs that recall the uniforms worn by horse riding jockeys. The collection is inspired by the Parade Ring, or paddock, where horses walk around as a warm-up before the race and to help racegoers pick a winner.
